```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)
```

use data.table for large datasets

use `fread()` to load file

```{r}
flights1 <- fread("../data/nycdata.csv")
```

```{r}
flights2 <- read_csv("../data/nycdata.csv")
```

```{r}
str(flights1)
```

```{r}
str(flights2)
```
```{r}
flights1[origin == "JFK" & dest == "LAX"]
```

```{r}
flights1[, 6:8]
```

get specific rows:

```{r}
flights1[c(1,3,207)]
```

add col

```{r}
flights1 <- flights1[, c("gain") := .(dep_delay - arr_delay)]
```

summaries in column slot
